alert.note: Alert for Eastern Santa Clara Hills; Northern Salinas Valley, Hollister Valley and Carmel Valley; Santa Clara Valley Including San Jose; Southern Monterey Bay and Big Sur Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 21 at 11:48AM PDT by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Santa Clara and northwestern San Benito Counties through 1215 PM PDT... At 1144 AM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Gilroy, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Small hail may accumulate on roadways creating hazardous travel conditions. Lightning will be possible. Locations impacted include... Salinas, Gilroy, Hollister, Prunedale, San Juan Bautista and Aromas, Route 156 between San Juan Batista and Hollister, and the de anza hiking trail. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Please exercise caution driving on roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Santa Clara Hills; Northern Salinas Valley, Hollister Valley and Carmel Valley; Santa Clara Valley Including San Jose; Southern Monterey Bay and Big Sur Coast
